Arkadaşlarla çok sarıyor. Oyununun gameplay videolarını izlemeniz lazım anlayabilmeniz için eğer hiçbir bok bilmeden oyuna girerseniz bu ne aq deyip çıkarsınız. Bu incelemeyi yazarken 18 saatim var ama eminim ki 200-300-400 saatlere ulaşacaktır. Oyun sarıyor özellikle katil !!!!

This is a great game to play with your friends. There are some problems with some killers being a bit too overpowered, but nothing is balanced perfectly. The survivors all have bloodwebs which are where you unlock items and perks for your characters. You unlock the items and perks with bloodpoints that you get for playing the game. The characters have some pretty good perks that can really help you survive. Sneaking around, doing generators, its all pretty fun. Neat game 7/10
Esse jogo é brabo demais cara, unica coisa contra ele é mapa fechado e desbalanceamento de rank.
Muito Bom

Игра полная помойка, своих денег не стоит, если кратко. Теперь почему помойка. Изначально игра привлекла своей концепцией, ибо аналогов не было. Но наиграв в эту игру 140 часов (этого достаточно)  чтобы понять о игре много, игра один сплошной минус , баги , баланс, ее игроки, геймплей и система рангов.  
Баланс: это самое интересное , если кратко , то начиная с 5-го ранга , у вас нет шансов , если вы не играете за билли , нурсу , и охотницу(и то, нужно иметь скилл) , ибо приоритет у выживших . Если ты чуть чуть понял , как играть за выжившего , то игра будет в кайф , ибо что-то могут сделать только 1-5 ранги , остальные изи , и это рандом, а если тима , то совсем другая история, тут ничего не поможет. Ни какой ман, ни какой скиловик , раньше думал ,что может я плохо играю , но нет , даже стримеры , которые считаются хорошими игроками сливают тиме в 0 )(Rafraider HELHAIND и тд)  
Объясню геймплей против тимы , если ты ман 5 ранга. Есть типы , которые все прокачали и им не нужен фарм и тд , у них есть цель победа-издевательство(не фан, ибо фан , это когда все бегут спасать одного, когда кемпишь , и все же ты не отдаешь 1, но когда у них цуль победа и издевательство , это другое) И они действуют по стандартной схеме, 2 бегают, 2 чинят( более опытной тимы бегает один и все чинят разные гены) вот, когда пошел генраш , ты понимаешь , что бегать за одним это не правильно , и пошел тем кто чинят, поскольку они тима, те кто чинили , начинают бегать) Наоборот вообщем. И все ровно идет генраш, и совершенно ничего нельзя с этим сделать, совсем ничего , они быстро сбегают и все, минус ранг + мало бладов. продолжая тему баланса , он топ, когда только купил игру , захотел поиграть за убийцу, ну как все новички) Я 20 ранг, первая игра , вообще , самая самая первая , что думаете? Кидает к 7-9 рангам , фул пристиж и 1300 часов в стиме) Думаю про баланс хватит)  
Баги: Телепорты , из 10 каток, в 5-ти он есть, пробитие полет , летающий билли со склона на пиле , охотница кидающая топоры сквозь стену и тд. 
О, игроки, это просто максимально токсичные люди, думаю, тут объяснять не нужно)

С огромным скрежетом, я порекомендую эту игру.
Плюсы:Достаточно сложный и многообразный геймплей если использовать навыки на полную.Хорошая атмосфера у большинства карт прям чувствуется что либо тоби .... либо то что тебя все боятся.
Минусы:НАХУЯ было делать такую уродски долгий поиск матча.В старых версиях маньяк был хостом и люди находились за 2-3 минуты максимум, а теперь надо самому маньяку коннектиться к выжившим что сделано через жопу.БЛЯТЬ 10 МИНУТ МИНИМУМ ты будешь искать пати выживших. И не дай КОК они будут профи потому что бегать за 4 свехрзвуковыми мышами по которым хрен попадёшь это так себе занятие (я смог таких всех убить и это капец как сложно было).За выжившего пати находится за минут 5-10 что тоже немного раздражает. 
Думаю про баги и недооптимизацию я говорить особо не буду за исключением одного их дофига.

I was genuinely suprised at how good this game actually was. Wasn't expecting much from it and was annoyed that you had to pay for the extra characters, but.... I tried this game during the free weekend and after one game I bought the whole thing AND even bought an extra character and will probably buy the whole lot eventually. So addictive! Love that all the characters have different perks and that you can level them all up and do daily quests and also that there is more than one way for the survivors to win. Great to play with strangers.... Even better to play with friends. 
Also, even though it's very actiony.... It's still quite terrifying when you're hiding in a locker and the killer stops right next to you, searching!

先免费试玩了两天，于2020年6月20日，32元购入本体，其他大部分DLC都有5折。
游戏很好玩，无论是人类还是屠夫。可以独狼也可以团队，因为不存在输赢，只要尽力让自己得分就好。画面特别真实，RTX2060超高画质2K只能勉强60+帧。（解除锁帧方法可以百度）
[b]缺点目前有①低段位屠夫很难匹配到人，②太血腥了没有和谐的设置，③屠夫建主机，所以有时候会卡。[/b]

Depois de *700 horas* vamos a análise..

Dead By Daylight é o único jogo em que você pode jogar com praticamente todos os clássicos do terror. É realmente incrível a diversidade de personagens que o jogo lhe oferece. Por exemplo : Leon (Resident Evil) Cheryl(Silent Hill) Laurie(Halloween)Nancy(Stranger Things) e de assassino Freedy Krueger em uma única partida. Que jogo lhe oferece isso?

No começo você pode pensar que o jogo não tem alguma competitividade ou algo do tipo. Porém , é o que mais tem! Muito difícil você jogar uma partida pensando em apenas fugir. Normalmente em Ranks mais altos você pensa em jogar melhor que o Killer. Até porque existem diversos truques disponíveis no game como conhecimento de loops para enrolar o assassino enquanto seus amigos fazem geradores. Ou truques criados pela comunidade como o 360 entre outros. Ou seja , competitividade pode não parecer no começo , mas é o foco.

A comunidade do jogo eu diria que é o ponto mais fraco do jogo , Se você tem ansiedade ou se estressa fácil e deixar se lidar pelos comentários no final da partida, vai acabar desinstalando o jogo.. isso porque muitos players xingam os killers no final da partida por eles jogarem. Seja porque o Killer tunnelou, campou ou algo do tipo.. sempre vai ter alguém para chorar. Independente do lado, de sobrevivente ou Killer. A maior dica é ignorar esse tipo de comentário e jogar do jeito que você quiser, os sobreviventes podem lutar tranquilamente contra assassinos campers.

Enfim, O jogo é maravilhoso e eu gosto muito dele! Fiz muitas amizades durante as horas, eu recomendo fortemente comprar apesar do que foi citado acima. Você provavelmente não vai enjoar fácil , até porque a empresa do jogo SEMPRE atualiza e lhe deixa preso no jogo. Dead By Daylight é um excelente jogo e sem dúvidas vale a pena jogar.

This is the ultimate horror co-op survival game, that's the bottom line here. This game is fantastic, and even though it's around 5 years old, it still stays relevant. 
The game is basically 4 "survivors" trying to escape the trial, and win the game. There is 1 "killer" who tries to stop them from completing those objectives. Survivors can use a variety of skills that provide some kind of benefit to the survivor/other survivors, items that can help survivors complete their objectives. Each survivor comes with some unique skills, as well as general skills that can be unlocked through the "bloodweb", which consumes "bloodpoints"(in game currency earned by playing the game). Most of the survivors are original characters, equipped with their own backstories, but there are also some crossover characters from beloved horror video games, movies, and tv shows. Using these skills and items, survivors have to fix 5 generators to power 2 exit gates, which when opened, allow survivors to escape the trial. But they won't be able to escape so easily without evading... the killer.
The killers try to stop the survivors from fixing generators and escaping the trial. Each killer, much like survivors, have unique skills and general skills unlocked using the same bloodpoints. The killers also have a special ability that cannot be unlocked for other killers, but it gives each killer a unique edge in hunting survivors. Most of the killers are very original and are also equipped with their own backstories, but of course, the game allows you to play as some of the horror genre's scariest killers.
There is so much more to figure out, but I'll leave that for you when you play the game for yourself.
I've got some pros, cons, and changes for this game: 

Pros: This game has so much content and love from the developers. The game has not changed its core gameplay concept over its 5 year lifetime, but it has been updated constantly in order to stay relevant. Recently, DbD got an enormous graphics overhaul, and we are expecting more huge overhauls in the coming months. Maps have been redesigned, balanced, and updated to look more modern, and keep up with graphics of modern games. Even characters have been getting updated looks. Gameplay is fun, and it always seems to scare me slightly even with over 100 hours in the game. There are so many pros, but I don't have the time to write them all down. 

Cons: Right now, it seems like the game doesn't have a ton of people playing the game sometimes, so it can take anywhere from 30 seconds to 5 or even 10 minutes to get into a match. The way the game works allows for killers to make life for one survivor a living hell. Gameplay abuse sucks, and toxic killers and survivors are something to watch out for. The game isn't perfect, so sometimes the hitboxes don't seem to line up as well as they should. Due to the lack of people, sometimes you may be paired against a killer or survivors who are much higher rank then you, so the game can be one sided, especially if the killer or the survivor has ranked up their character enough to where their skills give them an unfair advantage. Also, it is not the game's fault entirely, but all of the crossover characters can only be purchased by another in game credit which can only be earned in the "battle-pass" or buy purchasing them. The price is so high that you either have to grind for months to buy one crossover character, or just crumple and spend real life money on the characters, which is kind of sad, especially if those characters have desirable skills that you want to unlock for all of your characters.

Changes: I personally think there needs to be a training mode where players can practice their skills more. A single player mode would also be fun, but that's my own opinion. New game modes would also bring an opportunity for the devs to experiment with different types of game objectives, and for players to experience something very new in the game. 

Overall, this game is truly amazing, and I'd give it an 8/10. There is still a lot of things in the game that need to be added, tweaked, and fixed, but no game is perfect. I would highly recommend this game, so much so that I bought this game for my friend. I hope that you find something special in the game, and that you have the same excitement and fear that I experienced when I first played this game. Remember, death is not an escape.

Gostei do jogo numa forma geral. De início o jogo é dificil, mas com o tempo o jogo fica cada vez mais viciante. E as DLCs são espetaculares. Recomendo a quem gosta de dar aquele grind num jogo sem se fartar. Só a comunidade é um pouco tóxica, única crítica.

Dead By Daylight is just one of those games everyone needs to play at least a few times. In the beginning it's absolutely terrifying you'll find yourself hiding in lockers anytime there's a heartbeat. However as the game progresses you'll find yourself with multiple P3 characters, still hiding in lockers anytime you hear a heartbeat. This has been the story of a scummy claudette main wishing you would stop struggling so I could get hatch.     -Sincerely someone too afraid to play the game normally xD
